title: Male groom, one of a pair
description: male standing figure on a crescent-shaped ceramic base; white V-neck shirt with orange collar; orange leggings; black shoes; pointy hat with two orange diamond designs; arms are raised as if in a fighting pose; pair of grooms (L2005.40.1.1-.2) and pair of camels (L2005.40.2.1-.2) are a set
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
